title: Why does the place relate to the poet

content.question: According to the report, people always think of Du Fuâ€™s Thatched Cottage whenever they talk about the poet because

choices.label: he spent his last years there
he wrote about it in his poems
he wrote more than two hundred poems there
it was built in his memory

content.answer: he wrote more than two hundred poems there

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
